overview: In the beginning of Moondance we meet Carole and Diane in the throes of a passionate reunion. After the initial intensity subsides, fiery Carole demands to know the true reason why her former lover has returned to their lake house three years after she left. Diane's superficial charm does not penetrate Carole's hard exterior. It is not until Diane invokes their painful past that they are forced to decide whether they are willing to heal and forgive each other.
title: Moondance
